hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y git tar ant wget openjdk-8-jdk maven curl gpgv nodejs
rm -rf source_root mkdir source_root cd source_root export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-s390x export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
#sudo ln -sf `which nodejs` /usr/local/bin/node
GPG_TTY=$(tty) export GPG_TTY #generate gpg key cat >gen-key-script <<EOF %echo Generating a basic OpenPGP key Key-Type: DSA Key-Length: 1024 Subkey-Type: ELG-E Subkey-Length: 1024 Name-Real: Joe Tester Name-Comment: with stupid passphrase Name-Email: joe@foo.bar Expire-Date: 0 Passphrase: abc %pubring foo.pub %secring foo.sec # Do a commit here, so that we can later print "done" :-) %commit %echo done EOF
gpg --batch --gen-key gen-key-script
#Install rvm and nvm cd $HOME curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable --autolibs=enabled && . $HOME/.profile command curl -sSL https://rvm.io/mpapis.asc | gpg --import - wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.26.1/install.sh | bash && . $HOME/.bashrc
export _JAVA_OPTIONS=-Xmx4096m export JVM_ARGS="-Xms4096m -Xmx4096m" export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xms4096m -Xmx8192m -Xss4096k"
cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/apache/storm.git cd storm git checkout tags/v1.1.1 #Skipping test due to random intermittent failures mvn -B clean install -DskipTests
#create binary distribution cd storm-dist/binary && mvn -B package -Dgpg.skip=true
